segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing so precariously, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s taking cookies right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting below, ready to catch whatever he drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re working together, but this is such a bad idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the floor is wet—what if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop them before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR
